00038         wxString GetTypeString() { return _("V1720");};
00039         CVT_V17XX_TYPES GetType(){ return CVT_V1720;};
00040         double GetClockMHz() const { return CVT_V17XX_BOARD_CLOCK_KHZ[ CVT_V1720_BOARD_CLOCK_INDEX]*0.001;};

00042         double GetVolt2Bit() const { return ((double)( 1<< 16)) / 2.00;}

00044         double GetFPGADivider() const { return 2;}
